Package org.mundo.net.transport.ip

Provides classes for IP-based communication.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IIPTransportConnection IP-based transport connections implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
IfUDP A protocol condition testing whether a UDP-based transport is used.
IPLink Describes an IP-based link to an adjacent peer.
IPNetInterface  
IPTransportService Implements a transport service based on IP.
IPTransportService.OptBroadcast Options to configure node discovery.
IPTransportService.OptDiscovery Options to configure node discovery.
IPTransportService.OptHost Options to open a connection to a specific host.
IPTransportService.Options Options to configure the service.
IPTransportService.OptMulticast Options to configure IP Multicast discovery.
IPTransportService.OptNet Options to configure broadcast discovery.
NetExt Native socket API extensions.
TCPTransportConnection Implements a transport connection using TCP/IP.
UDPTransportConnection Implements a transport connection using UDP/IP.
 

Package org.mundo.net.transport.ip Description

Provides classes for IP-based communication.
